trans-unit.resname: Email address is used for authentication. It cannot be blank.
trans-unit.source: Email address is used for authentication. It cannot be blank.
trans-unit.target: Email address is used for authentication. It cannot be blank.

trans-unit.resname: The ban reason will be presented to the user when he tries to log in. It cannot be blank.
trans-unit.source: The ban reason will be presented to the user when he tries to log in. It cannot be blank.
trans-unit.target: The ban reason will be presented to the user when he tries to log in. It cannot be blank.

trans-unit.resname: Enter email address "{email}" to delete your account
trans-unit.source: Enter email address "{email}" to delete your account
trans-unit.target: Enter email address "{email}" to delete your account

trans-unit.resname: Please enter the account email address to remove account.
trans-unit.source: Please enter the account email address to remove account.
trans-unit.target: Please enter the account email address to remove account.

trans-unit.resname: Email address will be used to identify your account. It cannot be blank.
trans-unit.source: Email address will be used to identify your account. It cannot be blank.
trans-unit.target: Email address will be used to identify your account. It cannot be blank.

trans-unit.resname: Thank you {name}! Your email address has been confirmed. Your account details are now completed.
trans-unit.source: Thank you {name}! Your email address has been confirmed. Your account details are now completed.
trans-unit.target: Thank you {name}! Your email address has been confirmed. Your account details are now completed.

trans-unit.resname: The email address {email} is already taken by other user. Please try a different email address.
trans-unit.source: The email address {email} is already taken by other user. Please try a different email address.
trans-unit.target: The email address {email} is already taken by other user. Please try a different email address.

trans-unit.resname: A new verification email has been sent to your inbox. Please check your email to complete the verification process.
trans-unit.source: A new verification email has been sent to your inbox. Please check your email to complete the verification process.
trans-unit.target: A new verification email has been sent to your inbox. Please check your email to complete the verification process.

trans-unit.resname: If there is a user with the provided email address, a link to reset your password will be sent to you.
trans-unit.source: If there is a user with the provided email address, a link to reset your password will be sent to you.
trans-unit.target: If there is a user with the provided email address, a link to reset your password will be sent to you.

trans-unit.resname: Welcome a board {name}! You have been registered.
trans-unit.source: Welcome a board {name}! You have been registered.
trans-unit.target: Welcome a board {name}! You have been registered.

trans-unit.resname: {name}, your account has been successfully deleted. We're sorry to see you go, but you're always welcome to return and create a new account in the future. Thank you for being a part of our community!
trans-unit.source: {name}, your account has been successfully deleted. We're sorry to see you go, but you're always welcome to return and create a new account in the future. Thank you for being a part of our community!
trans-unit.target: {name}, your account has been successfully deleted. We're sorry to see you go, but you're always welcome to return and create a new account in the future. Thank you for being a part of our community!

trans-unit.resname: A user with email '{mail}' already exists
trans-unit.source: A user with email '{mail}' already exists
trans-unit.target: A user with email '{mail}' already exists

trans-unit.resname: Validation token has expired. Please request a new email confirmation.
trans-unit.source: Validation token has expired. Please request a new email confirmation.
trans-unit.target: Validation token has expired. Please request a new email confirmation.

trans-unit.resname: Confirm Your Email Address - Forum DAF
trans-unit.source: Confirm Your Email Address - Forum DAF
trans-unit.target: Confirm Your Email Address - Forum DAF

trans-unit.resname: Forum API project, driven by Symfony 7 and PHP 8.3, serves as the nucleus of learning, introducing students to the realms of DDD, Hexagonal Architecture, and CQRS.
trans-unit.source: Forum API project, driven by Symfony 7 and PHP 8.3, serves as the nucleus of learning, introducing students to the realms of DDD, Hexagonal Architecture, and CQRS.
trans-unit.target: Forum API project, driven by Symfony 7 and PHP 8.3, serves as the nucleus of learning, introducing students to the realms of DDD, Hexagonal Architecture, and CQRS.

trans-unit.resname: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your personal information, including your profile and settings. However, your forum posts (questions and answers) will remain visible, but they will be attributed to an "Unknown User". Once your account is deleted, you will not be able to regain access to any data or restore your previous account.
trans-unit.source: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your personal information, including your profile and settings. However, your forum posts (questions and answers) will remain visible, but they will be attributed to an "Unknown User". Once your account is deleted, you will not be able to regain access to any data or restore your previous account.
trans-unit.target: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your personal information, including your profile and settings. However, your forum posts (questions and answers) will remain visible, but they will be attributed to an "Unknown User". Once your account is deleted, you will not be able to regain access to any data or restore your previous account.

trans-unit.resname: If you choose to return to the forum, you are welcome to create a new account, but it will be treated as an entirely new account without any connection to your previous activity.
trans-unit.source: If you choose to return to the forum, you are welcome to create a new account, but it will be treated as an entirely new account without any connection to your previous activity.
trans-unit.target: If you choose to return to the forum, you are welcome to create a new account, but it will be treated as an entirely new account without any connection to your previous activity.

trans-unit.resname: To reset your password, please provide the email address you used during registration.
trans-unit.source: To reset your password, please provide the email address you used during registration.
trans-unit.target: To reset your password, please provide the email address you used during registration.

trans-unit.resname: Make sure your email address has been verified. If these conditions are met, you'll receive an email with a link to reset your password.
trans-unit.source: Make sure your email address has been verified. If these conditions are met, you'll receive an email with a link to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your email address has been verified. If these conditions are met, you'll receive an email with a link to reset your password.

trans-unit.resname: Forget it, {start_link}send me back{end_link} to the login screen.
trans-unit.source: Forget it, {start_link}send me back{end_link} to the login screen.
trans-unit.target: Forget it, {start_link}send me back{end_link} to the login screen.

trans-unit.resname: Hi {name}, please create your new password below to complete the reset.
trans-unit.source: Hi {name}, please create your new password below to complete the reset.
trans-unit.target: Hi {name}, please create your new password below to complete the reset.

trans-unit.resname: When banning a user, please provide a reason for the ban. This reason will be displayed to the user whenever they attempt to log in with the banned email address. Keep in mind that once banned, the user will no longer be able to access the site using that email address. It is important to provide a clear and valid reason, as it will be shown to the user upon login attempts.
trans-unit.source: When banning a user, please provide a reason for the ban. This reason will be displayed to the user whenever they attempt to log in with the banned email address. Keep in mind that once banned, the user will no longer be able to access the site using that email address. It is important to provide a clear and valid reason, as it will be shown to the user upon login attempts.
trans-unit.target: When banning a user, please provide a reason for the ban. This reason will be displayed to the user whenever they attempt to log in with the banned email address. Keep in mind that once banned, the user will no longer be able to access the site using that email address. It is important to provide a clear and valid reason, as it will be shown to the user upon login attempts.

trans-unit.resname: Your email address has not been verified yet.
trans-unit.source: Your email address has not been verified yet.
trans-unit.target: Your email address has not been verified yet.

trans-unit.resname: Please check your inbox for the verification email. If you didn’t receive it, click the button below to resend the confirmation link.
trans-unit.source: Please check your inbox for the verification email. If you didn’t receive it, click the button below to resend the confirmation link.
trans-unit.target: Please check your inbox for the verification email. If you didn’t receive it, click the button below to resend the confirmation link.
